title.rendered: SAT Exam at SSHS Rescheduled to March 25

content.rendered: The SAT exam previously scheduled to be held on March 11 at Saratoga Springs High School has been rescheduled to March 25.  Please visit https://www.collegeboard.org/ for test information and registration.

excerpt.rendered: The SAT exam previously scheduled to be held on March 11 at Saratoga Springs High School has been rescheduled to March 25.  Please visit https://www.collegeboard.org/ for test information and registration.
